/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a winding road that cuts through a lush forest. The road, a two-lane blacktop with a white dividing line, curves gently to the right, disappearing into the distance. It's flanked by an array of trees and shrubs, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are standing at the edge of the road, looking down its length. The perspective gives a sense of depth and scale to the image, drawing the viewer into the scene.
